description:
Montreal, Oct. 22, 2012 - Éric Araujo explains how individual developpers can contribute to Python: documentation, patches, ect.

Useful links:
* Help: http://www.python.org/about/help/
* MP32: http://montrealpython.org/2012/10/mp32/
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: How you can contribute to Python #MP32
